name: FIREGENERATION COLLABORATIVE
sampleDescriptions: Tribal Self-Determination and Co-Management in Forestry Act (H.R. 3444); FORESTS Act (discussion draft); National Prescribed Fire Act (S. 2015/H.R. 3889).
